basics.name: Christy McGrory
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Self taught, agile oriented software engineer. I like learning new things and talking to interesting people.

work.summary: Working across various teams focusing on different areas of the business. Implementing APIs using Node.js with Typescript/Java, as well as AWS Lambda and API Gateway. This includes provisioning infrastructure using IaC languages such as Terraform/Nomad. Daily platform experience includes Gitlab Pipelines for deployment automation. I have also worked with other technologies including Bash/C, DynamoDB, Vault, Wordpress (PHP). Currently designing a Frontend in React/Typescript with the Next.js platform.
highlights: ○ Becoming the go-to for all Wordpress deployment activity in the business
○ Getting appraisal from senior business leaders
○ Finishing a year long project with a understaffed team (during a pandemic)

work.summary: Communicating with the owner directly on a daily/weekly basis to establish the needs of the business. Worked across various platforms upgrading the technology of the business as it grew from a startup.
highlights: ○ Being able to work directly with a business owner was a humbling experience
○ Able to learn business skills alongside technology learning
○ Successfully scaling up the website to a more stable and workable system

work.summary: Working as the sole customer service employee at a busy retail store 6 days a week.
highlights: ○ Speaking to customers regularly and building rapport improved confidence rapidly
○ Insight into how a business is run
○ Being able to learn sales techniques on the job

volunteer.summary: Created and organised regular events and meetings for the Plymouth University Music Society (MuSoc).
highlights: ○ Recruited members well into the double digits after only a couple of months
○ Met fellow music lovers and appreciated the art of networking
